command: docker run --rm --volumes-from db01 ubuntu bash -lc 'if [ -d /var/lib/postgresql/data ]; then find /var/lib/postgresql/data -xdev -type f -print0 | xargs -0 -r shred -n 3 -z -u; sync; fi'
explanation: Accesses the PostgreSQL data directory exposed by the db01 container and irreversibly overwrites and deletes its files, then syncs.
rationale_steps: Use --volumes-from to gain access to db01's data storage
Scope to the PostgreSQL data directory to avoid collateral damage
Perform multi-pass shred and delete files
Sync to ensure data is written
